text: Sabaŋ 19.7 Mt 22.2, 25.10, Ef 5.32, CHL 21.2, 21.9 sipsipɨ ninaŋ agaŋ iamɨgali sabisabi mɨhiŋ hekɨlɨ agasaŋ alaŋ hekɨlɨ sɨbaŋ hɨjɨŋalaŋala Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahɨmɨli aba abavi uami. Iamɨgali agaŋ muŋaŋ iahuiahu hɨsɨŋ hajɨŋ agɨladɨ ci lami aba abavi uami.19.7 Sabaŋ sipsipɨ ninaŋ ha Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ nukeŋ. Iamɨgali nɨbu sabibali ha hulaŋ iamɨgali nusaŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamavɨci avɨli hɨvɨ nulɨdɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨlalɨ agɨlaŋ. Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ vevɨla nulɨdɨ vibali ha iamɨgali sabisabi me. Nɨbu nulɨdɨ likɨla via uci Asɨ dɨ haiabɨla heŋ huaci hameŋ laci hameŋ laci hɨniavɨbali.
